channel.title: Max level in a skill 99 max combat level 126
channel.description: i rly only want 99 for max stat and 126 for max combat just like real rs so if u have a code 4 that it would help alot ty=]

item.title: Max level in a skill 99 max combat level 126
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

You dont even need a code =).

Go into your client.java, press CTRL + F and search for:

[code]public int getLevelForXP[code]

Under that you should get a code that looks like this:

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= CurrentTotalStatLevel; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return CurrentTotalStatLevel;[/code]

Change:

[code]for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= ###; lvl++) {[/code to:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= YOUR MAX STATS LEVEL; lvl++) {

And
return ###; to whatever you want your max level to be.

Save>Compile>Run[/code][/code][/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Max level in a skill 99 max combat level 126
